content.p: The Student Registry Office oversees administrative matters that concern students, including: You can e-mail us for any of the above request. The Quality Manual determines a great deal of the policy and procedure within the Registry Office. This document is the Universityâ€™s central source of information relating to policies and procedures and is relevant to both staff and students. We are here to support students so if you have any queries, please contact us by email. You may also visit the Student Registry Office which is located on the First Floor, Block A (Administration Building). Our office is open from 9:00am-5:30pm, Monday - Friday. The University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8663 email: student_registry@nottingham.edu.my
